column1: .@JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris have won this election.   Unity won.  Decency won. Working families won. Our health won. Our planet won. Our democracy won.  Let's celebrate this victory and then let's get to work on building this country and world back better. Together.

Happy #ElectionDay!   New Mexicans: up & down the ballot let's elect leaders who'll fight for working families & a safer healthier future. Leaders like @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris @benraylujan @xochforcongress @Deb4CongressNM @TeresaForNM @NMSenateDems & @NMHouseDems. #VOTE.

.@JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris have the vision and the plan to stop the extinction and climate crises and achieve #30x30. Our planet's life support system depends on it. We can't survive four more years of Trump. https://t.co/KjfkHlT4Nj

New Mexicans: Come get out the vote for Biden-Harris with @JohnKerry! We’ll talk about how @JoeBiden will make America a global leader again—fighting climate change and the pandemic and building a safer cleaner world. https://t.co/n12u0IWne0

Whether you’re a Republican Democrat or independent @JoeBiden will be an American president a president for all of us. Under his leadership we’ll defeat the virus and build back better. Joe will fight for you and your family every single day. #Vote https://t.co/45n8QFNRu4

Attention New Mexicans: If you still have your absentee ballot please take it to the County Clerk's office or any early voting site in your county.  And remember: you can early vote today and beat Election Day lines. #Vote https://t.co/xF8XVQEgM8
Every American's vote should be counted. We will not tolerate Republican efforts to suppress the vote or cut short the count. Our democracy is on the ballot--and every voter deserves a say. #Vote
4 days to stop 4 more years. Vote for @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris. https://t.co/4aMJ5EVaPz

.@JoeBiden with a powerful message in Georgia today:   "With our voices and our votes we must free ourselves from the forces of darkness from the forces of division and from the forces of yesterday — from the forces that pull us apart hold us down and hold us back."   #VOTE https://t.co/luTKMConjU

New Mexicans! Please complete your absentee ballot and mail it in today so it has plenty of time to arrive. You can still hand-deliver it to any polling place during early voting or on Election Day. Go to https://t.co/kCv4NMzxtK for more information!

The choice could not be more clear. A vote for Trump is a vote to continue his disrespect and disregard for Native Americans. A vote for @JoeBiden is a vote to empower tribes to exercise their inherent rights & create prosperity. My op-ed w/ @RubenGallego: https://t.co/lewS7IvBYL

Another debate another clear contrast between a real leader like @JoeBiden and someone who is totally unfit for office—@realDonaldTrump.  While Donald Trump lied about his record Joe Biden showed a vision to beat this virus and rebuild the economy Trump destroyed. #vote

We are facing nature and climate crises of epic proportions. The Trump administration has the worst environmental record in history. We need @JoeBiden's leadership—to save nature and the land and wildlife we cherish. https://t.co/kTGeJfKcK4

.@KamalaHarris showed America why Joe asked her to be his running mate. She expertly laid out the Biden-Harris vision for how we’ll overcome the Trump administration’s failures—on COVID the economy health care and the environment—and build a better future for all. #VPDebate

Do not listen to President Trump’s lies.  Instead listen to @JoeBiden when he says: your vote counts.   Voting is the most fundamental right you have as an American. And the sanctity and survival of democracy depends on you exercising that right.   Vote.

Let’s be honest about what we saw tonight: a president who refused to condemn white supremacists who denied climate change and who embarrassed the country with his attempts to undermine our elections.   But we also saw @JoeBiden show us what real leadership looks like.

In the face of unhinged and unpresidential behavior @JoeBiden clearly won this debate.   Americans heard Joe Biden’s vision for how we’ll turn the page on the disasters of the Trump era get COVID under control stop the attacks on health care and build back better. #Debate2020

BREAKING: William Perry Pendley is OUT at the Bureau of Land Management. No longer will this anti-Native anti-conservation crusader be in charge of our public lands. Thanks @stevebullockmt for taking action. https://t.co/XKvdXk7xyq

Thank you to all the New Mexico Delegates for representing our great state at the #DemocraticConvention. Now we must continue the hard work of getting @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris elected this November.

At the #DemConvention @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris showed America that they are the leaders this nation needs. Now we must work our hearts out to make sure the Biden-Harris ticket wins New Mexico & wins this election. Let’s get out there and vote to restore our democracy.

My friend @KamalaHarris is an exceptional exciting & historic choice for the ticket. For her whole career she has fought for working people—the people that Trump and Pence have failed.  I can't wait to help @JoeBiden and Sen. Harris win the West and win this election. Join us! https://t.co/yDyCy8u0ti

Thank you @JoeBiden. The Grand Canyon is irreplaceable—sacred to Tribes & treasured by all Americans.  It’s outrageous that Donald Trump wants to let uranium mining corps near the Grand Canyon. Americans are sick and tired of Trump selling our public lands to the highest bidder. https://t.co/jWpH35u0pR
@JoeBiden @realDonaldTrump I will do everything I can to make sure @JoeBiden wins #NewMexico in the fall and puts an end to the disastrous nightmare of the Trump presidency once and for all. - TU

As vice chairman of the Indian Affairs Committee I'm proud to stand with @JoeBiden who will listen to Native American Tribes and protect the lands rights and future of Indian Country--unlike the current president.

@JoeBiden @JoeBiden will defeat @realDonaldTrump and he will be an outstanding president for *all* Americans. He will stand up for working people who have been left behind by this president and he will restore the soul of this nation that has come under attack from President Trump.

@JoeBiden I want to thank @BernieSanders for the incredible race he has run. I know that he will never stop fighting for working people and for the progressive values that must define our path forward and that he will continue to be a leading voice in our coalition.

We need clear-eyed principled and steadfast leadership for the working families of New Mexico and this nation. The leader we need is Joe Biden.  That's why today I am enormously proud to endorse @JoeBiden for president.
